::SnowCat::

She looked at the ship.  She felt extremely exhausted. "It's nice.  
Well vented, needs a new coat of paint, but not bad."

She sat down to catch her breath.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus slows to a walk, emerging into the clearing with the Ark. 
He looks at 
> the beaten-up ship, turning back to SnowCat.
> 
> "This is the Ark," he says, "Kinda our temporary base."
